description:
Trying to rest during summer vacation, Shizuka constantly calls and text.  Komachi breaks the cycle when she Hachiman agrees to take her to Chiba.  But before they make it to the station…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anyway, Getting No Rest, Even Though It`s Summer Break, Just Isn`t Right.
Quoi qu`il en soit, en été, on devrait se reposer.
Tomoare, Natsuyasumi na no ni Yasumenai no wa Nanika Okashii.
ともあれ, 夏休みなのに休めないのは何かおかしい.
